companyIdentity.companyDescription: Boutique consulting and technology firm specializing in sales enablement through customized learning platforms, AI-powered coaching tools, and performance intelligence systems for B2B enterprise revenue teams
companyIdentity.missionStatement: Transform B2B sales performance through the seamless integration of learning, workflow automation, and contextual AI that lives where sellers actually work
companyIdentity.brandPromise: Deliver measurable sales performance improvement through custom-built enablement systems that combine methodology, technology, and in-the-flow coaching
companyIdentity.headquarters: San Francisco, CA with operations in Lisbon, Portugal

valuePropositions.title: Measurable Sales Performance Improvement
valuePropositions.description: Drive quantifiable improvements in pipeline quality, deal velocity, and win rates
